languages.text: "То есть жизнями моей команды вы рисковать не боитесь? Советую подумать дважды, прежде чем отвечать".

traits.locale_text: "То есть жизнями моей команды вы рисковать не боитесь? Советую подумать дважды, прежде чем отвечать".

languages.text: "And what about my crew? Do you concern yourself with their lives at all? I urge you to think twice before answering."
languages.original_text: "То есть жизнями моей команды вы рисковать не боитесь? Советую подумать дважды, прежде чем отвечать".

traits.locale_text: "And what about my crew? Do you concern yourself with their lives at all? I urge you to think twice before answering."
"And what about my crew? Do you concern yourself with their lives at all? I urge you to think twice before answering."
"And what about my crew? Do you concern yourself with their lives at all? I urge you to think twice before answering."
"And what about my crew? Do you concern yourself with their lives at all? I urge you to think twice before answering."
"And what about my crew? Do you concern yourself with their lives at all? I urge you to think twice before answering."
"And what about my crew? Do you concern yourself with their lives at all? I urge you to think twice before answering."

languages.text: 「では、私の乗務員はどうなのだ？その命をカシア殿は意にも介さないというのか？答える前によく考えてもらいたい」
languages.original_text: "And what about my crew? Do you concern yourself with their lives at all? I urge you to think twice before answering."

traits.locale_text: 「では、私の乗務員はどうなのだ？その命をカシア殿は意にも介さないというのか？答える前によく考えてもらいたい」

languages.text: “那我的船员呢？你在乎过他们的性命吗？我劝你回答这个问题之前，最好先仔细想想。”
languages.original_text: "And what about my crew? Do you concern yourself with their lives at all? I urge you to think twice before answering."

traits.locale_text: “那我的船员呢？你在乎过他们的性命吗？我劝你回答这个问题之前，最好先仔细想想。”

languages.text: « Et les membres de mon équipage ? Leur vie vous importe donc si peu ? Je vous suggère vivement de bien réfléchir avant de répondre. »
languages.original_text: "And what about my crew? Do you concern yourself with their lives at all? I urge you to think twice before answering."

traits.locale_text: « Et les membres de mon équipage ? Leur vie vous importe donc si peu ? Je vous suggère vivement de bien réfléchir avant de répondre. »

languages.text: «¿Y qué hay de mi tripulación? ¿Es que sus vidas no significan nada para usted? Le apremio a pensárselo dos veces antes de responder».
languages.original_text: "And what about my crew? Do you concern yourself with their lives at all? I urge you to think twice before answering."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y qué hay de mi tripulación? ¿Es que sus vidas no significan nada para usted? Le apremio a pensárselo dos veces antes de responder».

languages.text: "Und was ist mit meiner Crew? Interessieren Euch deren Leben kein bisschen? Ich bitte Euch, überlegt gut, ehe Ihr antwortet."
languages.original_text: "And what about my crew? Do you concern yourself with their lives at all? I urge you to think twice before answering."

traits.locale_text: "Und was ist mit meiner Crew? Interessieren Euch deren Leben kein bisschen? Ich bitte Euch, überlegt gut, ehe Ihr antwortet."

languages.text: "Peki ya benim mürettebatım ne olacak? Onların canı hiç mi umurunda değil? Bu soruya cevap vermeden önce iyice düşünmeni tavsiye ederim."
languages.original_text: "And what about my crew? Do you concern yourself with their lives at all? I urge you to think twice before answering."

traits.locale_text: "Peki ya benim mürettebatım ne olacak? Onların canı hiç mi umurunda değil? Bu soruya cevap vermeden önce iyice düşünmeni tavsiye ederim."
